item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, October 24, 2024 at 5:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Wall-mounted diffusion mirror that turns reflections into paintings (200 points | 41 comments)
2. AWS data center latencies, visualized (42 points | 20 comments)
3. Everything I built with Claude Artifacts this week (443 points | 312 comments)
4. Show HN: RF Hunter – Find hidden cameras and other devices (65 points | 23 comments)
5. NetGuard – rootless Android outbound per-app OSS firewall, like LittleSnitch (45 points | 18 comments)
6. Playstation Vita Architecture (Part 1) (159 points | 52 comments)
7. What happens when you make a move in lichess.org? (216 points | 101 comments)
8. How do merging supermassive black holes pass the final parsec? (17 points | 12 comments)
9. Pretty.c (10 points | 4 comments)
10. Show HN: Open-source low-code email editor (92 points | 18 comments)
11. Necromanteion of Acheron (15 points | 2 comments)
12. TSMC cuts off client after discovering chips sent to Huawei (124 points | 32 comments)
13. Fearless SSH: Short-lived certificates bring Zero Trust to infrastructure (81 points | 66 comments)
14. Postbox has been acquired by eM Client (55 points | 15 comments)
15. Rust in enterprise kernels (40 points | 5 comments)
16. Async Rust in Three Parts (105 points | 27 comments)
17. Probably pay attention to tokenizers (207 points | 64 comments)
18. Irreproducible Results (2011) (25 points | 14 comments)
19. My NumPy year: Creating a DType for the next generation of scientific computing (42 points | 4 comments)
20. Chromium uses web search for .internal TLD instead of opening URL (56 points | 25 comments)
21. Launch HN: GPT Driver (YC S21) – End-to-end app testing in natural language (96 points | 73 comments)
22. A DSL for peephole transformation rules of integer operations in the PyPy JIT (88 points | 7 comments)
23. Parks on the Air (86 points | 44 comments)
24. Reinforcement Learning: An Introduction (2018) (66 points | 15 comments)
25. Show HN: I built a task manager that separates "do" and "due" dates (112 points | 50 comments)
26. Taming the buck with a Type III compensator (35 points | 6 comments)
27. The Tragedy of Google Books (2017) (402 points | 162 comments)
28. Seeing faces in things: A model and dataset for pareidolia (46 points | 7 comments)
29. Bulk optimization of queries in Postgres (58 points | 3 comments)
30. It has been [33] days since the last Hubris kernel bug (59 points | 7 comments)
